name: Surf the Taste
description:
Create waves to push the tasty ship into your mouth. Avoid islands and other obstacles and do not let the ship escape.

You can have active three waves simultaneously. If a wave hits the ship, the wave will perish and you can create a new one.

Controls:

You can create waves on three rows.
Use Q-P for the upper row,
A-OE for the middle row and
< - : for the lower row.
Press Ctrl + R to restart the current level immediately.
Press Escape to return to the main menu.

Credits:

Created by Jonathan Krönke and Magnus Drebenstedt as part of the Franken Game Jam 2020.

Sounds:

Splash, Jumping, A.wav by InspectorJ (https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/)

Font:
